Name: Evaverse
About the game: SOCIAL IMMERSION WONDERLAND EVAVERSE offers a social immersion platform for friends and players to hang out together in a brand new digital world. It's designed to be an ever-evolving digital landscape that can be shaped by our community of players. Future game mechanics and playstyles can be voted on by the community and developed as the game progresses over time. Hoverboard racing is the latest update to the world of the Evaverse. All players can race for free by toggling the race panel in-game. Players may also host their own servers or join others as they hang out inside the EVAVERSE. Servers have voice chat and a variety of mini-games to play while spending time in the EVAVERSE. MINI GAMES FOR RELEASE Hoverboard Races - Race across the Evaverse on a hoverboard Railgun - Shoot players and stun them from across the map Low Gravity - Climb the tallest peaks by modifying your gravity settings Bowling - Set up some pins to knockdown Soccer - Create a ball to kick around Tag - Keep away from the person who is it The EVAVERSE game will continue to grow and expand in future releases and will always be free-to-play!
